name: Docker Service
description: Ensures the Unraid Docker daemon (dockerd) is active and automatically restarts it if not.
check_cmd: if pgrep dockerd >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi
fix_cmd: if [ -x /etc/rc.d/rc.docker ]; then echo '⚠️ Restarting Unraid Docker service...'; /etc/rc.d/rc.docker start >/dev/null 2>&1 || /etc/rc.d/rc.docker restart >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; else echo '⚠️ rc.docker script not found'; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 3; if pgrep dockerd >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
